description: The Granary Long Sleeve Tee is an everyday wardrobe staple designed with a casual relaxed fit and the natural benefits of 100% pure merino wool. Soft, breathable, and odor-resistant, this versatile tee is all about comfort and style, with a classic ribbed neckline to complete the look. <br><br>Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the incredible performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to synthetic clothing based on petrochemicals. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Granary LS Tee - Womens
